page.title: 01Gazetteer of Knypersley.
page.content: Knypersley area lies to the South and ast of Biddulph.It now forms a dormitory suburb and consequently looks to Biddulph for amenities. The area is mostly rough grazing land with a small concentration of private housing in the North West. This area contains the chief amenity centered on Biddulph High School. This provides education for the 13-18 age range and the Evening Institute. The centre of the area contains the Knypersley Pool Reservoir and the nature reserve and recreation centre of Greenway Bank Country Park. The main industry is farming. Most employment is found outside the area in Stoke-on-Trent, Congleton,Biddulph. Knypersley tends to be parochial in outlook as shown by the news, leisure, sports and entertainment to be found.
